公司名稱: 泰奈科技有限公司
薪資: 薪資面議(經常性薪資達4萬元含以上)
工作內容: We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer to join our team to serve our growing client base.The successful candidate will be someone who has experience from designing and delivering a number of software/infrastructure solutions.【What Youll Do】 ● Work with a focus on providing the best technical support to our customers. ● Collaborate with a diverse background of the product, and operations team members to deliver the best solution for our customers. ● Architect and build data pipelines that ingest and process large quantities of structured and unstructured data from varied sources. ● Take on the challenge of making what you build higher quality, faster, and more scalable. ● Research, learn and work with the newest tools. ● Work with a focus on quality. ● Develop high-quality, maintainable, and scalable solutions. ● Design, code review, static analysis, continuous integration. ● Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members. ● Be on a pager duty rotation to respond to availability incidents.【What Youll Bring】 ● BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science or related technical fields. ● 3+ years of experience as a backend developer. ● Exposure to a wide range of open source technologies and best software practices. ● A pragmatic attitude and approach to solving problems. ● Willingness to work in a fast-paced environment, learn new technologies, and software. ● Ability to quickly prototype ideas. ● Must be a team player. ● Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. ● Excellent analytical skills. ● Have strong knowledge of Java (preferably Java 8). ● Have experience with relational and NoSQL databases. ● Rock-solid on coding and testing best practices. ● Language requirement: Chinese (Native) + English (Working proficiency).
擅長工具: 程式設計：JAVA、Spring作業系統：Mac OS資料庫：PostgreSQL程式設計：Github
其他條件: 【Bonus Points】 ● Experience of microservices architecture. (development and testing) ● Have experience with a range of open source Java libraries and frameworks, for example, Spring, Hibernate…etc. ● Familiarity with REST Web Services. ● Experience with version control systems (ideally Git). ● Cloud application development like AWS, GCP... ● Experience with both functional and imperative programming. ● Experience with automation testing frameworks/test automation tools like Selenium or Serenity. ● Experience writing and performing load testing using tools like JMeter, or Gatling. ● Experience testing Angular applications and associated tools like Protractor. ● Experience with NodeJS, Typescript & GraphQL.【What We Offer for You】 ● Year-end bonus. ● Holiday bonus for the three important Chinese holidays. ● Birthday gift / Birthday leave. ● Menstrual leave. ● Complete training (professional skills and language skills). ● Annual leave better than the law.
